data.details: Examine the nightstand closely, looking for anything I might have missed - hidden compartments, unusual markings, anything that could be a clue to escaping this room.

results.simulacra_profiles.sim_sustdj.last_obser: You examine the nightstand closely, running your hands over its surface and checking for any hidden compartments or unusual markings. The charging cables are hopelessly tangled, and the half-empty glass of water leaves a sticky residue. Underneath the glass, you find a faint impression of a key.

data.outcome_description: At 04:07 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez examined the nightstand closely.

data.narrative: At 04:07 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel examines the nightstand again, this time more meticulously. He runs his fingers along its surface, checking for hidden seams or buttons. The mess of tangled charging cables snags on his hand, and the half-empty glass of water leaves a sticky residue on the wood. He lifts the glass, and underneath, he notices a faint, almost imperceptible impression – the outline of a **key (key_impression_01)**.

discovered_objects.name: Impression of a Key
discovered_objects.description: A faint impression of a key left on the surface of the nightstand.

data.details: Search the wardrobe carefully, checking all pockets of the clothing, any drawers or compartments, and the general interior of the wardrobe for a key.

results.simulacra_profiles.sim_sustdj.last_obser: You search the wardrobe carefully, checking all pockets of the clothing, any drawers or compartments, and the general interior. In the pocket of an old coat, you find a small, ornate key (key_01).

data.outcome_description: At 04:08 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez searched the wardrobe for a key.

data.narrative: At 04:08 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel opens the wardrobe, the scent of old wool and mothballs filling the air. He meticulously checks the pockets of each garment, rummaging through forgotten jackets and coats. Finally, in the pocket of an old, rarely worn coat, his fingers brush against something metallic. He pulls it out - a small, ornate **key (key_01)**, intricately designed with a strange, almost archaic pattern.

discovered_objects.name: Ornate Key
discovered_objects.description: A small, ornate key with an archaic pattern.

data.details: Check under the bed and the bed frame for any hidden compartments or locks that the key might open.

results.simulacra_profiles.sim_sustdj.last_obser: You check under the bed, finding only dust bunnies and a few lost charging cables. Examining the bed frame, you discover a small, almost invisible keyhole. The ornate key (key_01) fits perfectly.

data.outcome_description: At 04:10 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez checked under the bed for a hidden compartment.

data.narrative: At 04:10 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel gets on his hands and knees, peering under the bed. It's a classic hiding spot, but all he finds are dust bunnies and a few stray charging cables, adding to the already impressive collection. He runs his hands along the bed frame, and on the side facing the wardrobe, he discovers a small, almost invisible **keyhole (keyhole_bedframe_01)**. With a growing sense of anticipation, he retrieves the ornate key and tries it. It slides in perfectly.

discovered_objects.name: Keyhole
discovered_objects.description: A small, almost invisible keyhole on the bed frame.

data.details: Turn the ornate key in the keyhole of the bed frame.

results.simulacra_profiles.sim_sustdj.last_obser: You turn the ornate key in the keyhole. With a soft click, a section of the bed frame slides open, revealing a hidden compartment (compartment_bedframe_01).

data.outcome_description: At 04:11 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez turned the key in the bed frame.

data.narrative: At 04:12 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel turns the ornate key in the keyhole. There's a soft click, and a section of the bed frame smoothly slides open, revealing a hidden **compartment (compartment_bedframe_01)**. A rush of stale air escapes the opening, carrying with it the faint scent of old paper and something metallic.

discovered_objects.name: Hidden Compartment
discovered_objects.description: A hidden compartment revealed in the bed frame.

data.details: Open the hidden compartment in the bed frame and examine its contents.

results.simulacra_profiles.sim_sustdj.last_obser: You open the hidden compartment in the bed frame and examine its contents. Inside, you find a rolled-up map (map_01), a small metal box (metal_box_01), and a note (note_01).

data.outcome_description: At 04:12 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez opened the hidden compartment in the bed frame.

data.narrative: At 04:12 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel reaches into the hidden compartment. Inside, he finds a tightly rolled-up **map (map_01)** tied with a faded ribbon, a small, tarnished **metal box (metal_box_01)**, and a folded **note (note_01)**, its edges yellowed with age. He carefully pulls the items out, a surge of adrenaline coursing through him. Could this be the key to escaping this strange, door-less room? The news about the transit deal and the Diddy trial suddenly feel very, very far away.

discovered_objects.name: Rolled-up Map
discovered_objects.description: A tightly rolled-up map tied with a faded ribbon.

discovered_objects.name: Folded Note
discovered_objects.description: A folded note, its edges yellowed with age.

data.details: Unfold the note and read its contents.

results.simulacra_profiles.sim_sustdj.last_obser: You unfold the note and read its contents. The note reads: 'The exit lies where the sun never shines. Seek the gaze of the silent guardian. Only then shall the path be revealed.'

data.outcome_description: At 04:13 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez unfolded the note and read it.

data.narrative: At 04:13 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel carefully unfolds the fragile note. The paper crackles softly in the dim light. He reads the cryptic message: 'The exit lies where the sun never shines. Seek the gaze of the silent guardian. Only then shall the path be revealed.' It's annoyingly vague, but Daniel feels a thrill of excitement. This is less of a room and more of an escape room. He rereads the note, the cloudy afternoon light casting long shadows that dance across the walls, adding to the mystery.

data.details: Unroll the map and examine it closely, looking for any landmarks or symbols that might relate to the note's clues: 'The exit lies where the sun never shines. Seek the gaze of the silent guardian.'

results.simulacra_profiles.sim_sustdj.last_obser: You unroll the map and examine it closely. It appears to be a hand-drawn map of the room, but with some key differences. Most notably, a large X marks the spot directly under the bed. Additionally, the wardrobe in the map is adorned with a carving of an eye.

data.outcome_description: At 04:14 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez unrolled the map and examined it.

data.narrative: At 04:14 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel unrolls the map. It appears to be a hand-drawn representation of the room, but with several key differences. A large 'X' marks the spot directly under the bed. And even more strangely, the wardrobe in the map is adorned with a carving of an **eye (eye_carving_wardrobe_01)**. The map confirms the lack of a door, adding to the unsettling feeling that this is no ordinary room. The 'silent guardian' might just be that eye, and 'where the sun never shines' is under the bed. The Gaza and Ukraine news feels like it's happening in another dimension.

discovered_objects.name: Eye Carving
discovered_objects.description: A carving of an eye on the wardrobe, as depicted on the map.

data.details: Examine the wardrobe closely for any sign of an eye carving, or any indication that a carving was once there but has been removed or hidden.

results.simulacra_profiles.sim_sustdj.last_obser: You examine the wardrobe closely, and you confirm that there is no eye carving. However, upon closer inspection, you notice a faint rectangular outline, suggesting that a carving was once attached but has since been removed.

data.outcome_description: At 04:14 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez examined the wardrobe for an eye carving.

data.narrative: At 04:14 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel approaches the wardrobe, the hand-drawn map still clutched in his other hand. He runs his fingers over the smooth wooden surface. There's no eye carving. But, upon closer inspection, he notices a faint, rectangular **outline (outline_wardrobe_01)**, almost imperceptible unless you're looking for it. It seems a carving was once attached there, but has since been removed. The 'silent guardian' is missing its gaze.

discovered_objects.name: Rectangular Outline
discovered_objects.description: A faint rectangular outline on the wardrobe, suggesting a carving was once attached.

data.details: Crawl under the bed to the spot marked with an 'X' on the map. Check the floor for any loose boards, hidden compartments, or anything out of the ordinary.

results.simulacra_profiles.sim_sustdj.last_obser: You crawl under the bed to the spot marked with an 'X' on the map. You feel around on the floor and discover a loose floorboard. Lifting it, you find a small hole leading to another location (Tunnel_01).

data.outcome_description: At 04:15 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez crawled under the bed to check the floor.

data.narrative: At 04:15 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel crawls under the bed, the dust motes swirling around him in the dim light. He reaches the spot roughly marked with an 'X' on the map and feels around on the floor. His fingers brush against something slightly raised. He pushes, and a **loose floorboard (floorboard_01)** gives way. Lifting it, he finds a small, dark **hole (Tunnel_01)** leading down into what appears to be another location. A tunnel, perhaps? The air from below smells damp and earthy. Finally, a way out!

discovered_objects.name: Loose Floorboard
discovered_objects.description: A loose floorboard under the bed.

discovered_objects.name: Hole/Tunnel Entrance
discovered_objects.description: A small, dark hole leading to another location.

discovered_connections.description: A small, dark hole leading down into what appears to be a tunnel.
